alert.note: Alert for Jefferson; Lafayette; Taylor; Wakulla (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 04 at 7:46PM EDT until August 04 at 8:15PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 815 PM EDT FOR SOUTHWESTERN LAFAYETTE...EAST CENTRAL WAKULLA...SOUTHWESTERN JEFFERSON AND CENTRAL TAYLOR COUNTIES... At 746 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 13 miles southeast of St. Marks to 12 miles south of Mayo, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Perry, Pinland, Newport, Goose Pasture, Hells Half Acre, Carbur, Plum Orchard, Adams Beach, Scanlon, Econfina, Salem, Perry-Foley Airport, Bucell Junction, Athena, Hampton Springs and Dekle Beach. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Continuous cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Move indoors immediately. Lightning is one of nature`s leading killers. Remember, if you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning.
